alert.note: Alert for Limestone; Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 22 at 9:57PM CST until February 22 at 10:15PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CST FOR WEST CENTRAL MADISON AND SOUTHEASTERN LIMESTONE COUNTIES... At 956 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Phil Campbell, or near Russellville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Western Huntsville, Madison, Athens, Redstone Arsenal, Marshall Space Flight Center, Huntsville International Airport, Tanner, Harvest, Mooresville and Belle Mina. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for north central, northeastern and northwestern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
